title: Asia Sushi Bar for Two
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Japanese, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has some marked vegetarian dishes as well as a few vegan suitable sushi itwems. You can also ask for some of the meat dishes to be made veg. Staff speaks German and English, and menus available in both. Most of the tables seat 4, with one larger table seating 8. Located at the end of Oberer/Unterer Markt.
